# Steven Ward

## City Council Member, District 4

![Photo of Steven Ward - Englewood City Councilmember](https://www.englewoodco.gov/home/showpublishedimage/7482/638290034968470000)![Council District 4 Map](https://www.englewoodco.gov/home/showpublishedimage/2202/638227865631400000) ****Contact****

**Phone:** 303-900-8811  
**E-mail:** [sward@englewoodco.gov](mailto:sward@englewoodco.gov)

* * *

Term Information

**Term:** 4 Year Term  
**Elected:** November 2021  
**Term Expires:** November 2025
